data.comment: The match is underway in Kashiwa.
Can Tosu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 2, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Tosu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Kashiwa.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 11, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Tosu throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 12, Tosu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Tosu push forward at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium and Daichi Hayashi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashiwa defence.
In the minute 14, Tosu's Tiago Alves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 15, Tosu are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tosu drive upfield and Tiago Alves gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 17, Tosu make their first substitution with Fuchi Honda replacing Tiago Alves.
Tosu are coming forward and Fuchi Honda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In Kashiwa Tosu attack through Yuta Higuchi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Tosu in Kashiwa.
In the minute 26, Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Tosu have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 29, Eduardo (Tosu) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Kashiwa defenders.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tosu.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 38, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 40, Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Tosu, close to Kashiwa's area.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick Tosu.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Tosu's half.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 44, In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Kashiwa.
Hidekazu Otani is booked for the home team.
The second-half is underway in Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Hidekazu Otani with Richardson.
In the minute 47, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 49, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 51, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashiwa just outside Tosu's area.
Kashiwa's Cristiano breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, In Kashiwa, Daichi Hayashi (Tosu) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Tosu take a 0-1 lead thanks to Daichi Hayashi.
That's a fine assist from Yuta Higuchi.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Tosu at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Tosu throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Tosu are pushing forward but Tomoya Koyamatsu's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Tosu have a dangerous throw-in.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tosu.
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a second substitution, with Hiroto Goya replacing Ataru Esaka.
Goal! Tosu extend their lead to 0-2 through Fuchi Honda.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Cristiano with Yuta Kamiya. This is the third substitution made today by Nelsinho Baptista.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu pushes forward through Tomoya Koyamatsu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Yusuke Segawa is on a sub for Hayato Nakama for Kashiwa.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 69, Throw-in high up the field for Tosu in Kashiwa.
Tosu's Yuta Higuchi misses with an attempt on goal.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 78, Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Yuta Kamiya of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 80, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 83, Important block from the Tosu defence as Yuta Kamiya fires in a strike for Kashiwa.
Tosu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kashiwa.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Richardson (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Hajime Matsuo.
Ryang Yong-Gi is replacing Ryoya Morishita for the away team.
Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's third substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Takeshi Kanamori replacing Tomoya Koyamatsu.
In the minute 85, Hajime Matsuo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, In Kashiwa, Yuta Kamiya of Kashiwa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Tosu's half.
Goal! Kashiwa reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Michael Olunga.
In the minute 87, Richardson with an assist there.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tosu make their fourth substitution with Yohei Toyoda replacing Daichi Hayashi.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In Kashiwa, Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Yusuke Segawa (Kashiwa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Tosu have a goal kick.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
